name: Urban Chase
description:
"Urban Chase" immerses players in a lively city chase between police and mischievous thieves. In this whimsical world, players take on the role of a police officer, engaging in thrilling pursuits to apprehend playful troublemakers.

Currently, players can exclusively experience the game from the perspective of a skillful police officer. Utilize your running skills to navigate the charming low-poly cityscape and apprehend the mischievous thieves who are up to playful antics.

Features:

Cute 3D Low Poly Graphics: Immerse yourself in a charming world with adorable characters and a visually appealing low-poly art style.



Diverse Stages: Thanks to the 12 stages that become progressively challenging and entertaining, there is no room for boredom.

Running and Capture: Chase down the mischievous thieves by showcasing your running skills, adding a dynamic element to the pursuit. Enhance your pursuit with boosters and handcuffs, special items designed to aid in the capture.

Playful Thieves: The thieves in "Urban Chase" are full of mischief, making each pursuit a delightful and unpredictable experience.

Single-player Focus: As of now, players can exclusively enjoy the game in single-player mode, taking on the role of the police officer.

"Urban Chase" offers a delightful and lighthearted experience as you dash through the city streets, chasing down playful thieves in this whimsical 3D low-poly world. Get ready for a charming adventure where cuteness meets crime-fighting fun!
